mapper.select:
select a.JOB_NAME, a.TRIGGER_NAME , a.NEXT_FIRE_TIME , a.PREV_FIRE_TIME, a.TRIGGER_STATE, a.TRIGGER_TYPE, a.START_TIME, a.END_TIME , b.DESCRIPTION, b.job_class_name , c.cron_expression
from QRTZ_TRIGGERS a, QRTZ_JOB_DETAILS b , qrtz_cron_triggers c where a.JOB_NAME = b.JOB_NAME and a.trigger_name=c.trigger_name order by start_time
